snippet: The California Supreme Court has ruled that images captured by traffic cameras are valid evidence against drivers who run red lights, in a victory for law enforcement over the use of the cameras that have often been met with public distrust....

headline.print_headline: California Supreme Court Backs Red-Light Traffic Cameras
headline.main: California Supreme Court Backs Red-Light Traffic Cameras

lead_paragraph: The California Supreme Court has ruled that images captured by traffic cameras are valid evidence against drivers who run red lights, in a victory for law enforcement over the use of the cameras that have often been met with public distrust.
